user_query: I am organizing a healthcare conference and I need a list of healthcare businesses to invite as exhibitors. Can you provide me with their contact details? Additionally, I need nutritional analysis for the food we will be serving at the conference.

TaskList.description: Gather a list of healthcare businesses that can be potential exhibitors for the conference.
Retrieve contact details for each healthcare business identified in Step 1.
Collect nutritional information for the food that will be served at the conference.
Perform nutritional analysis based on the collected information from Step 3.
